column1: Kata Robata////Jacob provides excellent service for me at the sushi bar.  Nice restaurant setting
column2: more high-end than the average sushi spots.  Good variety of fish from kohada
column5: chu toro and akami.  Fresh Santa Barbara uni was a leaping portion for sushi
column7: I think I had most of them.  Would of like the Foie a bit more seasoned
column8: the Foie sushi was a bit too cooked.  Everything was fast even though quite busy.
